entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is mentioned as a concealed location behind a portrait.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: A fat lady in a pink silk dress is described as guarding the entrance to the tournament.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as giving a password to enter the tournament.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as casting a dark look at the fire and muttering about slave labor.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as climbing up to his dormitory with Ron and Neville.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as climbing up to his dormitory with Harry and Neville.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as climbing up to his dormitory with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as getting into bed in the dormitory.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as getting into bed in the dormitory.

relationships.description: Hermione mutters at Harry about slave labor.
George gives a password to the fat lady to enter the tournament.
